reviews.review: Una secuela bastante más innovadora que su antecesora ambientada en Rapture (Bioshock 2), ya que aquí vuelve el factor sorpresa y la tensión, aunque eso sí, de diferente forma que el primer título de la saga, ya que la ambientación y la perspectiva de los personajes ha cambiado sustancialmente, dando un soplo de aire fresco en cuanto a jugabilidad, trama, que está muy cuidada, y ambiente, que no dejará indiferente a nadie, representado todo ello con el potente motor gráfico Unreal Engine 3. El final es uno de los que más me han dejado sin palabras como jugador. Alucinante y sensacional, y uno de los mejores finales que he podido ver en un videojuego.
Ничего не понятно, а так оно и надо.
Manh this game never gets old . its been 8 years , but still a masterpiece  § . Elizabeth prolly be one of the badass female character ever created ig :)
отличная игра
后面两章一脸懵逼。上网看完解析后玉玉了
谢谢这个游戏让我知道晕3d是什么感觉
재밌다
给生化奇兵系列画了一个圆满的句号，虽然结局并不是皆大欢喜的大团圆，但是却诠释了什么是超越时空的信念，什么是第九艺术，这就是。

What else can be said about Bioshock: Infinite that hasn't already? It's pretentious, convoluted, and stupid; with worse gameplay than its predecessor. Gone are the RPG-lite elements from the original games, 'Plasmids' are replaced with generic feeling, off-brand, 'Vigors' (that you can't combine with gunplay like in BS2), you are limited to only two weapons at any one time, upgrades aren't visual anymore, enemies are mostly random cops or generic, red-clad, anarchists, and the setting is even more unbelivable than Rapture. 

Scroll down the game page to see why people think they like this game: Elizabeth. This bland cartoon character that everyone seems to want to shag is simply insufferable, and she's with you 95% of the time... I swear the developers thought that is she just looked like a sexy Disney princess players would ignore how terrible of a character she is.

Elizabeth is part of the larger problem in Bioshock Infinite: the story. Gone is the fairly streamlined storytelling of the original, it's memorable characters, and interesting twists. Here, we have this convoluted multi-verse Inception thing that ends up feeling pretentious and dumb. The game wants to be this heady piece of fiction, maybe along the lines of Primer or something, but lands so far from the mark it's kind of embarrassing. 

P.S - I hate the Lettuce twins.

A masterpiece of a game and a story. One of my all-time favorites, no hesitation. It was honestly bittersweet when I finished the story, bitter because it ended, sweet because I couldn't think of any other beautiful way to execute this masterpiece. Play this on your own or with someone else blindly because I don't have enough words to describe how beautiful it is.

The story was just an absolute beautiful mind-♥♥♥♥. I won't spoil the story for you, however I will say that the story isn't exactly written how some people prefer their stories to be written out. To help with that, I give this no story-spoiling advice which is [spoiler]pay attention to details, even if it seems like just little talk, otherwise you might end up feeling a little lost and confused. You may have to do some puzzles in your head to understand the story because the game leaves you to figure some things out.[/spoiler] If you're playing this for your first time, take in everything and enjoy it while it lasts. Not saying that there's no replay-ability, but the "big swing" is going to be the first time you play it. I wish I could blindly play it all over again.

The gameplay had unique elements to it that I enjoyed. As someone who's played plenty of FPS games before, learning how to play was a breeze, even with the extra fun mechanics added into the mix. The extra mechanics contributed to the art, its uniqueness, the magic, and tried to make it stand out from other FPS games. I won't spoil what those mechanics are, but they were fun and added extra flavor to the gameplay.

I recommend this game 10000000%, no hesitation; it will always be one of my all-time favorites. I wish I could blindly replay this game all over again. I LOVE IT. Thank you so much for this masterpiece, Irrational Games and 2K, and thank you for checking out my review! Just buy it full price or on sale, JUST BUY IT! 💜

What a breakaway game! No longer are we confined to the prison under the sea. We now are above the clouds. The storyline will pull you in and never let go. The stunning graphics will make you play this game over and over and never get tired of it.

This game is good but disappointing.  number 1 This game suffers from being shown off way to early.  The game went through three different versions . one was the 2010 demo which was more horror related and felt more like bioshock. and the 2010 one still kind of had a horror vibe and showed off a ton of cool features that were cut that fundmentally made infinte a different game. the two different factions the vox and founders were going to be a bigger part of the plot then they were both suppost to equally as bad but thats not  really show in the game and neither is the on going conflict. there was suppose to be moral choice mechincs in the game and choices whether to remain out of combat or not. songbird was suppose a mini boss like the big daddy in bioshock 1 .  Bioshock infinites heavy hitter like the boys of silence were supposed to function differently and be heavy featured in the game. The game was also suppose more of a semi open world like bioshock 1 with rapture but feels like corridor shooter. slight spoiler head. the twist ending just feels like in was tacted on just to have one as it makes no sense and is filled with plot holes and whats more insulting is that you kind of have to get the dlc to explain the ending and even that is filled with plot holes and doesn't do a good job. I feel that this game was an attempt to make bioshock appeal to casuals as the box art and the combat actually shows.  a lot of people say cyberpunk 2077 was falsely advertized but cyberpunk I wasn't as disppointed with besides the buggy mess. This game was falsey adveritsed  because it was shown off way too early  as its a complety different game than was originally pitched on shown of.  I ultimately think some of the choices made to cut certain features was done not because of techincal limitations but to appeal to the casual shooter fan and that is a shame. again false adveritsing I don't think they did on purpose but it was a mistake to show off the game  when most of the stuff got cut.  The good the game looks graphicly amazing and the skylines are a fun addition and combat fun when using the powers and skylines. I still reccomend the game as it is fun but just not as good  as it could have been or show off. songbird unfortuntally is little more than a cutscene and and end of the game mechinic rather than a proper threat or boss that was promised.

Очень сложно находить игры которые влияют на меня также сильно как повлияла BioShock Infinite.

Я не собираюсь писать спойлеры и хочу сказать, что это было блестящее завершение революции трилогии, и что эпизоды "Погребение в море" Первый и второй следует считать абсолютно обязательными, если вы хотите правильно играть в эту игру.

Эта игра была одной из немногих игр, которые не раз доводили меня до слез. Называйте меня плаксой или как угодно, но я также увлечен этой серией, как любой фанатик тем, чем он одержим.

BioShock всегда будет занимать особое место в моей жизни после завершения Infinite.

Я бы рекомендовал не только эту игру, но и BioShock, BioShock 2.
Если вы подумываете о том, чтобы купить эти игры, сделайте это, получите массу удовольствия.

Boring game design 
The story is over-complicated  like an avarage sci-fi movie where everything explained by quantum. 
no decisions, no different play styles, some of the vigors are unusable, weapons are bad.

Not the best from the franchise, because well...i dont like much dimensional stories and such, i find them to be kinda boring and too chaotic, ooh you tought that was what happened, but instead it happened this way, except it didnt but then it did, not a fan, but the game on itself without that is great, like the gunplay, not so much the vigors because the only worth while ones are devil's kiss, possesion and shock jockey, good graphics, finished the whole game in 11.4 hours, which isnt much to be honest, the game does have sidequests but i didnt do any, they all required you to get something and then come back to a place youve already been, the backtracking plus the bad arrow pointer dont encourage you to do them, but the game wasnt bad, just isnt the best of the series(which btw i got all of them on a bundle in a really good sale on steam, thanks Gaben), if you want to play it, wait for a good sale like the one i got, the clash in the clouds dlc is not worth it, doesnt add nothing, ill play the others dlcs some day.
Muy buen juego, la historia te atrapa y los DLCs también son geniales!
There are two kinds of people in this world: Those who say Bioshock series is a MASTERPIECE, and liars.

Great game with a fantastic story; a worthy successor of BioShock 1 & 2. Just like in the previous games, one can build and change their kit to suit their personal gameplay style. And there is also Elizabeth, one of the best -- if not the best -- companions in a video game I've ever experienced. Clearly expressed character in every way and helpful both in and out of combat. Strongly recommend, would play again.

I am new to Bioshock franchise. Bought it in bundle sale "let's give it a try". While first two games are brilliant, full of atmosphere and engaging gameplay, this one is simply bland. Boring corridor, no reason for exploration, dull enemies, just mediocre FPS. Such a shame and wasted potential.

Bioshockシリーズの名に恥じないストーリー性と世界観があります。(借金付き)

〇DLCを含めた全実績解除を目的に購入を検討されてる方へ
※個人的に苦戦した実績について説明

①実績「オールド・ラング・ザイン」と「スカベンジャー・ハント」
内容は最高難易度「1999」モードのクリア と 1999を回復＆弾薬を販売する自販機で購入をする事なくクリア、難易度は高いですが一部のビガーが強い上に、「ブリトル・スキンド 」「ウィンターシールド」の有無で難易度が大幅に下がります、序盤でギアを厳選できるポイントがあるので厳選をおすすめします、預言者よ卑怯とは言うまいな？

②DLC実績「ワンツーパンチ」
内容はクラッシュ・イン・クラウドで全8種類のビガーコンボで敵を倒すこと、コンボ成功の判定が分かりづらい上に何も考えず無邪気にデビルズ・キスを強化すると「デビルズ・キス → チャージ」で苦労するよ。

③DLC実績「ブルーリボン・チャンピオン」
恐らく実績解除を行う上で最後に立ちはだかる実績、内容はDLCのクラッシュ・イン・クラウドで1エリア15waveの4エリア全てのブルーリボン・チャレンジ（60個）を獲得すること、一番のポイントを例で言うと 15wave中の15wave目 のチャレンジを失敗するとそのエリアの最初(1wave目)からで途中スタートが出来ない点、このリトライのせいで途中精神が壊れかけます、踏ん張りましょう。

自分はこのゲームをXbox・PS・PCで遊ぶぐらいに楽しんでると同時にここに書いた実績に恐怖してます。

我記得我是2017買的，到了2021年底才破關
每次想開坑就是懶得開，也不知為啥
可能是面對神作有種恐懼感，怕玩了就玩不起其他遊戲  qq...
[strike]我巫師3也不敢開坑，悲劇....[/strike]

[h1]劇情：[/h1]
這遊戲的劇情真是神到不行，破關後還在回味劇情....
[spoiler]伊莉莎白跟布克是父女關係，康姆斯托克跟布克是不同時空的自己
而康姆斯托克搶走安娜，布克想找回女兒而跨越時空（跨越時失去記憶....）
其中盧特斯兄妹佔據了相當大的份量，在海葬dlc中
得知黛西在盧特斯兄妹的勸說下必須殺了那兩人
目的是為了讓伊莉莎白殺了她，讓她黑化....看到這段真讓我震驚
原來一切都有預謀，如果安娜沒被搶（賣）走，我想這一切都不會發生了
也讓我想吐槽，怎麼不找其他人的孩子偏偏找上了平行時空的自己
結局中，布克下定決心要殺死平行時空的自己，想補償伊莉莎白
殺死其他世界的自己，讓安娜不變成伊莉莎白，這或許也是一個好結局吧
但經歷這一切的布克跟伊莉莎白就會就此消失，只剩下安娜跟布克生活的世界
這趟旅程中兩人的互動已經歷歷在目深刻在心，少了這兩人還是會有點難過。[/spoiler]

dlc海葬，似乎跟1~2代有相關，最少我玩的時候有點搞不太懂.....（因為我還沒玩1~2....）
[spoiler]這個世界好像是別的時空的布克，還遇到伊莉莎白，變得很成熟
委託布克找尋小女孩，找尋中回想起過去的事情，到最後被大老爹貫穿....
感受到布克真的是很可憐，失去了兩個女兒，莎莉跟安娜......[/spoiler]

[spoiler]二部曲是伊莉莎白擔當，似乎是為就莎莉回來，還失去了能力
一開始就看到她掛了，只是被盧特斯兄妹送回來成為的凡人
這趟旅程充滿凶機，畢竟不像主角布克那麼強，我玩1998難度都靠潛行通過...
只有一關強行要打怪時才開始用彈藥，潛行關真的很累，尤其伊莉莎白又很脆
後期面臨到的拷問也讓我玩得很沉重，很想打爆那個叫[u]亞特拉斯[/u]的首領
即使完成各種不合理的要求仍然完成，還是被那個垃圾首領打死了
看到最後伊莉莎白死掉的樣子不禁難過了起來，也難怪有人說不要玩海葬。[/spoiler]

破關後想著伊莉莎白的一生，真的很悲慘，[spoiler]被生父賣掉，被養父囚禁
還被夜鶯給監控管制，童年都在書本上...也難怪布克救出伊莉莎白時
她快樂的樣子，深刻記著她跳舞跟吃棉花糖的樣子
真希望她能永存在那個時候，快樂又期待著在巴黎生活的樣子。[/spoiler]

[h1]優點：[/h1]
@[b]地圖[/b] 很美觀，幾乎每個地方都能拍照，藝術性很好
即使是2013年的遊戲，到現代也不遜色，遊玩過程真是嘆為觀止
@[b]音樂[/b] 好聽，尤其是伊莉莎白唱歌的那段，特別好聽
可惜沒出原聲帶，不然我就買了....
@[b]伊莉莎白[/b] 很會幫忙，[u]補血、彈藥補給、救人、開鎖[/u]、甚至還會[u]提醒玩家沒撿到東西[/u]
應該是我見過最聰明的npc，感覺生還者的艾莉跟戰神的阿特柔斯都輸了...
@[b]異能[/b] 幫助很大，最好用的應該是[u]野馬奔騰[/u]，除了大型怪跟機械怪不能用外
其他都能用，點滿可以在空中飄浮很久，魔力耗損也很低，cp值超高的能力
其次就是[u]攝魂迷心[/u]，最常拿來丟商店[u]偷錢[/u]，打怪就比較少，畢竟耗魔大
對大型怪無效機械怪也不持久....烏鴉對巨匠臂有奇效，好幾次都靠這招打爆他
@[b]劇情[/b] 超優秀就不必說了，破關後還讓我花很多時間去理解....
@[b]槍械[/b] 很穩，我原本以為玩這遊戲會很暈，但槍戰遊戲的後座力
在這遊戲幾乎沒有，所以我玩幾乎都沒暈，即使到了空軌上也是

[h1]缺點：[/h1]
@[b]槍戰過多[/b]，我槍戰最終還是不算好的那群人，本篇真是多到爆
在1999難度，死了好幾回，尤其是[u]鬼魂戰[/u]跟最後的[u]甲板戰[/u]，真是打的很累
幸虧有伊莉莎白的各種輔助，不然1999難度真難過
@[b]路人的表情[/b] 幾乎沒變，跟伊莉莎白相比真是差超多
不過我還是喜歡伊莉莎白豐富的表情，這遊戲細節做的很不錯

[h1]總結：[/h1]
有點後悔這麼晚才玩這遊戲，太晚體驗，也太晚認識伊莉莎白了
同時也知道為甚麼有人會對她如此著迷，對我來說她真是個好隊友
不會批判，會幫忙，會救人，記得中期有段[spoiler]要跟革命軍合作的劇情[/spoiler]
我一直不小心打死友軍，只有系統警告，伊莉莎白並沒有嘴我
那時候我就感受到溫暖，畢竟我很討厭被人嘴砲，很討厭被人罵
要我給這遊戲分數，我會給  [b][u]10/10[/u][/b]  實至名歸的分數，雖然有小缺點
但不影響整體的評價，即使是現在2022年，還是很推薦遊玩。

Booker. Are you afraid of God?
No, but I'm afraid of you.
[/i]

2013 yılında çıkmasına rağmen, 2020 yılında çıkan bir çok oyunlardan daha başarılı oynanışa sahip. 

Oyun içi bir çok şeyle etkileşime girilebiliyor. Şimdiye kadar yapılmış en iyi takipçi karakterine sahip (Elizabeth). Vigorlar fazla kullanışlı değil sadece zorunda kaldıkça kullandım(özel iksirler). Grafikler güzel.  Güzel bir hikayesi var ama anlaması ve ses kayıtlarını toplaması oyuncuyu yorabiliyor. 

Bu oyunu 3 defa bitirdim. Oyunu unuttukça dönüp oynamak oldukça keyifli. 1999 mode(En zor mod)' da bitirdim oyunu, aimbot gibi davranan sniper'lar, ölümsüz roketçi'ler bazen can sıkabiliyor. Final bölümünde mermisiz kaldım ve etrafta yeterli silah bulmak mümkün değildi, zar zor son bölümü geçtim. 

Şimdiye kadar oynamadıysanız çok fazla şey kaçırmışsınız demektir. 
1. ve 2. oyunları oynamadan da oynanabilir ama ara ara 1. ve 2. oyunlara göndermeler yapılıyor anlamak için oynamış olmak gerekiyor. 

Umarım sizler de severek oynarsınız.
Realmente ame mucho este juego y valio las horas que le dedique, sus historia, combate y personajes. Lo adore

There will be some minor spoilers in this review, but it serves as a guide for those that might get stuck in the same predicament as the previous me that played trough this game the first time. 
The part where you get to finks labor camp makes it seem as if you are playing a mindless shooter with some shoehorned mechanics. But I encourage you to push trough as the reward is great. This is a game that serves to tell a story rather then provide a gaming experience where all you do is shoot and loot. 

Before this game I believed that story driven experiences where best to be experienced in the way of cinema but this game changed the outlook I have on that subject. Some stories are better told trough the world of games. Much deserved praise this one.

História maravilhosa, jogabilidade fluida e muito divertido.

El juego es increible y tiene una muy buena e inmersiva historia, recomiendo tomarse su tiempo y ver bien los entornos ya que siempre te encuentras suministros para hacer mas facil la dificultad dificil aunque no sea nada de otro mundo. Al igual que recursos te encuentras cintas que te comentan parte de la historia por parte que cada personaje y sus opiniones sobre ciertos acontecimientos al igual que te encuentras mejor equipo.

Overall a very good game with compelling story and characters that you end up caring about, a lot! The graphic style is wonderful, we get to experience multiple memorable moments throughout the playthrough, although at points the missions feel like blank space made only to extend the game to a certain length (and I don't like that aspect when trying to solve such interesting story). Holistically it's definitely easier than Bioshock 1, which might be disappointing to some. And in the end, I have to say it's a real shame that the weakest element of the whole game is undoubtely the shooting (first-person shooter btw).

Bioshock Infinite non è troppo diverso dalle passate incarnazioni del brand, risultando dunque a livello di tante altre produzioni dello stesso genere. Il punto è che definire Bioshock Infinite uno sparatutto sarebbe riduttivo, quasi sbagliato. Un videogame dove coinvolgimento sensoriale, emotivo e narrativo fanno veramente la differenza. Columbia è completamente diversa da Rapture - è uno spaccato delle contraddizioni della società americana dei primi ‘900. E’ un’esperienza di grande impatto, capace di sviluppare in ognuno di noi una forte empatia verso i protagonisti, e di farci gioire e soffrire con loro in ogni istante. E’ una delle massime espressioni artistiche in ambito videoludico, dove sapere e libertà espressiva si uniscono formando un mosaico che non può lasciare indifferenti. Bioshock Infinite è un gioco perfetto, con pochissimi difetti, ma che non si può non amare. Perché Bioshock Infinite è una di quelle produzioni che lasciano un segno nell’industria videoludica e nel giocatore, venendo ricordate a lungo.

我认为游戏是个好游戏不管是画风还是剧情，不愧是被称为第九艺术，刚刚飞到哥伦比亚的时候真的很震撼，舒缓的音乐响起，哇，那种豁然开朗的感觉，完美。不过可能是因为2021年的原因吧，【对，我2021年才玩这款游戏，2021年快结束了我才玩的，笑死】已经完了很多的3A大作，我个人感觉这款游戏很多不足的地方，首先是剧情长度，我认为完全可以吧剧情流程做的在长一些，【下面会有剧透，并且是我个人的主观感受，会有错的地方】我感觉游戏对神父的刻画并不是很到位，虽然我知道神父就是主角了，但是我总是感觉还是差那么一点点，然后是我都打通了，还是不知道在主线剧情里怎样更换技能，是到了三代给取消了吗？全程只能用两个技能？而且是那到那个就只能一直用，直到遇到新的。然后是枪和前作不一样的是只能带两把了，我感觉可以，但是升级枪械貌似没有了前作的视觉更新，这个我感觉不太好。但是在dlc里技能和武器的切换却和前两代相同，可以带很多武器，并且可以随时切换武器和技能。并且会有好多bug，我让伊丽莎白卡住好几次，只能读档从来，还有是开锁，我明明让伊丽莎白开锁了，锁也掉了，但是门就是打不开，要是别的不重要的门就算了，但偏偏就是主线的门给卡住了，就很难受，希望可以修复bug。不过打完了之后我感觉这个bug问题不大，可以让我与伊丽莎白很近的在一起，我想多就就多久、2021年一玩，我发现这可以吊打2021年的新游戏，是哪个我就不说了。2022年，今天通的关，我还记得伊丽莎白在沙滩上跳舞，笑得很开心。总之，一句话，买就对了。
